attributes.action: acknowledge the uniqueness of the politicians Enoch Powell and Robin Cook as the only two politicians history has now proven EVER to have spoken the truth in the Debating Chamber by erecting a statue to each of them in the entrance to the House of Commons and erect a plaque showing the complete texts of Enoch Powell's 'Rivers of Blood' speech and Robin Cook's resignation speech (the only such speech EVER given in the House of Commons) which are to be read by every MP on every occasion before they enter the debating chamber, as a reminder to them as to how honest politicians should behave.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The current crop of primordial beings who occupy seats in the House of Commons wouldn't recognise the truth if it came up and bit them on their collective rear ends.  Robin Cook and Enoch Powell were real statesmen who were fundamentally honest.  Somebody or something needs to be done to remind our current elected representatives just what being honest sounds like.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
